content.content: Greetings from the Content Production Core Unit! Here’s what we’ve been up to over the past couple of weeks:  Administrative Updates  Providing a budget update to @Aes and preparing to resubmit our budget proposal   Content Production Video  Published  [Maker Relay] Votes & Polls (9/28 - 10/04) & (10/5 - 10/12) [Maker Relay] The State of Dai (9/28-10/04) & (10/05 - 10/12)   Hosted an AMA with Pairwyse  Organized Issue Discussion #2 | Fixed Rate Maker Vaults in collaboration with GovComms Uploaded videos to the MakerDAO Youtube Channel for other CUs  Writing   Maker Relay (in collaboration with GovComms)  Forum: Ep 65 and Ep 66  Substack: Ep 65 and Ep 66     Dai on Different Networks/The State of Dai  Forum: Ep 13 and Ep 14  Substack: Ep 7 and Ep 8     Audio  In the process of helping @elprogresso create a podcast Finalizing audio for explainer videos  Other   Prepping for the launch of Discord in conjunction with GovAlpha, GovComms, and Tech-Ops  Writing an announcement, copy for Welcome, Rules, and Resources, creating NFTs for users, and migrating emojis from Rocket.chat    Finalizing v2 of the Community Portal (Sneak Preview!)   Community Portal 2.0 will launch as a stripped-down version of the current Community Portal with a new CMS. We’ve revamped the Resources section, taken down much of the outdated content from the Learn section, and added email opt-in for blogs. We’ll provide a more detailed update upon launch and following the release of 2.0, we plan to focus on updating content in the Learn section. If you have any questions or there’s anything you would like to see on the Community Portal, please reach out!  Looking Ahead In the coming weeks, we’ll be:  Launching Discord Launching v2 of the Community Portal Publishing our first explainer video: How to Vote Finalizing Humans of MakerDAO content, please send images or schedule an interview if you haven’t done so yet. (These can be pseudo-anonymous) Hosting an AMA with CurioInvest  Announcing an AMA with the Risk Core Unit  As always, check out our Transparency Dashboard to see what we’re working on and please join us for our weekly Office Hours on Tuesdays at 14:30 UTC.
This topic was automatically closed 14 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
